title: Find Zevlor
content:
but Zevlor isn't with them. They claim he wanted to surrender to the cult. Some even think he was secretly a cultist. We should look for him. Arabella's father claims that Zevlor betrayed the tieflings, and tried to run. The tieflings were ambushed by the cultists out in the darkness. Zevlor urged them to surrender, and in the confusion the cultists attacked - kidnapping several of the tieflings.

We found Zevlor trapped in a pod - the same type we awoke in on the nautiloid. He will likely die
